content: The Locust Antennae Mask is obtained upon defeating any Grasshopper Guai enemy in The Verdure Bridge in Chapter 4 - The Webbed Hollow. Simply farm the enemy until it drops.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Locust_Antennae_Mask.md', within the main section titled 'Locust Antennae Mask'.
The content is as follows:
The Locust Antennae Mask is obtained upon defeating any Grasshopper Guai enemy in The Verdure Bridge in Chapter 4 - The Webbed Hollow. Simply farm the enemy until it drops.
